text: @EliStokols @PressSec Yes. Yes, it does. Pandemic spreading uncontrolled. Hospitals overwhelmed. Continued shortages of PPE.  Refigerator trucks needed to hold the dead.  Citizens blocked from international travel. And zero plan from the WH.  3.5M infections, 140K dead, https://t.co/YOQAuj4klU
